property.name: Calming
property.description: Induces a slight calmness in the user.

property.name: Euphoric
property.description: Induces mild euphoric in the user.

property.name: Focused
property.description: Focuses the user's mind.

property.name: Munchies
property.description: Makes the user hungry.

property.name: Paranoia
property.description: Induces paranoia in the user.

property.name: Refreshing
property.description: Slightly energizes the user.

property.name: Smelly
property.description: Makes the user unbearably smelly.

property.name: Calorie-Dense
property.description: Results in immediate weight gain.

property.name: Disorienting
property.description: Causes unpredictable movement and slight visual impairment in the user.

property.name: Energizing
property.description: Increases the users energy.

property.name: Gingeritis
property.description: After consumption, the user will become a ginger.

property.name: Sedating
property.description: Induces heavy sleepiness in the user.

property.name: Sneaky
property.description: Silences the users foot steps.

property.name: Toxic
property.description: Damages the user's liver and induces vomiting.

property.name: Athletic
property.description: After consumption, the user is only able to run.

property.name: Balding
property.description: Causes balding in the user.

property.name: Foggy
property.description: Causes a cloud of fog to form around the user.

property.name: Laxative
property.description: Causes the user to fart and shit uncontrollably.

property.name: Seizure-Inducing
property.description: Consumption results in an instant seizure.

property.name: Slippery
property.description: Reduces the user's ability to maintain traction on the ground.

property.name: Spicy
property.description: Consumption results in the user's eyes turning blue.

property.name: Bright-Eyed
property.description: Causes the user's eyes to emit light.

property.name: Glowing
property.description: Imbues a bioluminescence on the user.

property.name: Jennerising
property.description: Inverts the user's gender.

property.name: Lethal
property.description: Causes total organ failure shortly after consumption.

property.name: Schizophrenic
property.description: Induces hallucinations and unpredictable behaviour in the user.

property.name: Thought-Provoking
property.description: Increases the size of the user's head.

property.name: Tropic Thunder
property.description: Inverts the user's skin color.

property.name: Anti-gravity
property.description: Weakens the effects of gravity on the user.

property.name: Electrifying
property.description: Electrifies the user, causing arcs of electricity to be emitted, zapping anyone nearby.

property.name: Explosive
property.description: Causes the user to explode shortly after consumption.

property.name: Long faced
property.description: Considerably increases the size of the user's head and neck.

property.name: Shrinking
property.description: Shrinks the user.

itemDefn.name: Cuke
itemDefn.description: A refreshing can of Cuke that leaves you feeling energized. It's heaven in a can.

itemDefn.name: Flu Medicine
itemDefn.description: Pain reliever and mild sedative used to alleviate flu symptoms.

properties.name: Sedating
properties.description: Induces heavy sleepiness in the user.

itemDefn.name: Gasoline
itemDefn.description: A jerry can full of gasoline.

properties.name: Toxic
properties.description: Damages the user's liver and induces vomiting.

itemDefn.name: Energy Drink
itemDefn.description: Tasty energy drink filled with lots of yummy chemicals to make you feel refreshed. Removes the effects of drugs when consumed.

properties.name: Athletic
properties.description: After consumption, the user is only able to run.

itemDefn.name: Mouth Wash
itemDefn.description: Antiseptic mouth wash for a minty fresh breath.

itemDefn.name: Banana
itemDefn.description: Elongated yellow fruit, rich in potassium.

properties.name: Gingeritis
properties.description: After consumption, the user will become a ginger.

properties.name: Spicy
properties.description: Consumption results in the user's eyes turning blue.

itemDefn.name: Motor Oil
itemDefn.description: Specially formulated oil used for lubricating the moving stuff in an engine.

properties.name: Slippery
properties.description: Reduces the user's ability to maintain traction on the ground.

itemDefn.name: Iodine
itemDefn.description: Chemical element that is an essential nutrient in a healthy diet. It also has other purposes.

itemDefn.name: Viagor
itemDefn.description: Great for treating altitude sickness, and some other stuff.

itemDefn.name: Horse Semen
itemDefn.description: A big jug of ethically sourced horse semen.

properties.name: Long faced
properties.description: Considerably increases the size of the user's head and neck.

itemDefn.name: Mega Bean
itemDefn.description: An unusually large bean of mysterious origin.

properties.name: Foggy
properties.description: Causes a cloud of fog to form around the user.

itemDefn.name: Addy
itemDefn.description: Like meth except legal. Used to stimulate cognition.

properties.description: Increases the size of the user's head.

itemDefn.name: Battery
itemDefn.description: Small battery used to power stuff.

properties.name: Bright-Eyed
properties.description: Causes the user's eyes to emit light.
